com.adobe.icc.services.api

Interface LetterInstanceService

  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public interface LetterInstanceService
    Service interface for LetterInstanceVO specific operations. It provides create, read and delete operations on various instances of Letter. Instance of letter can be of two types viz. Drafts or Submitted

    • Method Detail

      • saveSubmittedLetter

        @Deprecated
LetterInstanceVO saveSubmittedLetter(Letter letter,
                                                 byte[] PDFBytes,
                                                 byte[] processedXDP,
                                                 byte[] dataXML,
                                                 String letterInstanceName)
                                          throws ICCException
        Deprecated. 
        Saves a submitted instance of a letter given various required inputs
        Parameters:
        letter - Letter object representing letter whose instance is to be saved
        PDFBytes - bytes representing the generated PDF for the letter instance
        processedXDP - bytes representing the processed XDP for the letter instance
        dataXML - bytes representing the data for the letter instance
        letterInstanceName - name of the letter instance to be saved
        Returns:
        A LetterInstanceVO object representing the saved submitted instance of letter
        Throws:
        ICCException

      • saveSubmittedLetter

        @Deprecated
LetterInstanceVO saveSubmittedLetter(Letter letter,
                                                 byte[] PDFBytes,
                                                 byte[] processedXDP,
                                                 byte[] dataXML,
                                                 String letterInstanceName,
                                                 byte[] adMergedJson,
                                                 String adNodePath)
                                          throws ICCException
        Deprecated. 
        Saves a submitted instance of a letter given various required inputs. This api is specific for saving submitted instance of adaptive documents based on letter.
        Parameters:
        letter - Letter object representing letter whose instance is to be saved
        PDFBytes - bytes representing the generated PDF for the letter instance
        processedXDP - bytes representing the processed XDP for the letter instance
        dataXML - bytes representing the data for the letter instance
        letterInstanceName - name of the letter instance to be saved
        adMergedJson - Merged Json for the adaptive document
        adNodePath - Path for the adaptive document based on this letter
        Returns:
        A LetterInstanceVO object representing the saved submitted instance of letter
        Throws:
        ICCException

LetterInstanceVO saveAsDraft(Letter letter,
                                         byte[] XMLData,
                                         String letterInstanceName)
                                  throws ICCException
        Deprecated. 
        Saves a draft instance of a letter
        Parameters:
        letter - Letter object representing letter whose instance is to be saved
        XMLData - bytes representing the data for the letter instance
        letterInstanceName - name of the letter instance to be saved
        Returns:
        A LetterInstanceVO object representing the saved draft instance of letter
        Throws:
        ICCException

        @Deprecated
LetterInstanceVO getLetterInstance(String letterInstanceId)
                                        throws ICCException
        Deprecated. 
        Gets a particular letter instance. This action is not audited for action type Read.
        Parameters:
        letterInstanceId - id of the letter instance to be read
        Returns:
        A LetterInstanceVO object representing the read instance of letter
        Throws:
        ICCException

      • letterInstanceExists

        @Deprecated
Boolean letterInstanceExists(String letterInstanceName)
                                  throws ICCException
        Deprecated. 
        Check if a LetterInstanceVO exists by the given name.
        Parameters:
        letterInstanceName - Name of the LetterInstanceVO.
        Returns:
        true if exists, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        ICCException

      • getAllLetterInstances

        @Deprecated
List<LetterInstanceVO> getAllLetterInstances(Query query)
                                                  throws ICCException
        Deprecated. 
        List all LetterInstanceVOs filtered by the given Query.
        Parameters:
        query - Query to select Letter (supports only first level attributes/properties of an object).
        The "attributeName" used in the Statement object should be the name of the property in the object (Form object, in this case).
        Returns:
        List of Letter objects
        Throws:
        ICCException
        See Also:
        Statement, Query
